links.*: Letter to Leila Keene and Pat Kirke
The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[11 January|11]]''' - [[Michael George Tolkien]], grandson of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is born.
* '''[[29 January|29]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to J.L.N. O'Loughlin (29 January 1943)|a letter to J.L.N. O'Loughlin]].

==April==
* '''[[10 April|10]]''' - [[Bo Hansson]], who will become famous for his music inspired by ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', is born.
* '''[[20 April|20]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 48]].

==July==
* '''?''' - [[Christopher Tolkien]] joins the Royal Air Force.
* '''[[28 July|28]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 49a]].

==August==
* '''[[3 August|3]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Leila Keene and Pat Kirke|a letter to Leila Keene and Pat Kirke]].
* '''[[10 August|10]]''' - Actor [[Peter McKenzie]] is born.
* '''[[16 August|16]]''' - Actress [[Sharon Baird]] is born.
* '''[[20 August|20]]''' - Actor [[Sylvester McCoy]] is born.

==September==
* '''[[1 September|1]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 49b]].
* '''[[8 September|8]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 49c]].
* '''[[9 September|9]]''' - Renowned scholar [[Tom Shippey]] is born. 
* '''[[13 September|13]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 49d]].
* '''[[19 September|19]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 49e]].

==October==
* '''[[25 October|25]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 50]].
* '''[[27 October|27]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 51]].
* '''[[31 October|31]]''' - Writer [[J.E.A. Tyler]] is born.

==November==
* '''[[3 November|3]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 51a]].
* '''[[10 November|10]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 51b]].
* '''[[29 November|29]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 52]].

==December==
* '''[[9 December|9]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 53]].
* '''[[15 December|15]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 53a]].
* '''[[25 December|25]]''' - [[Father Christmas]] writes his last letter to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.
* '''[[31 December|31]]''' - Actor [[Victor Raider-Wexler]] is born.

==Unknown==
* '''Early'''<ref group=note>This must have been during the first half of the year, considering that Christopher left for South Africa in July</ref> - [[Christopher Tolkien]] draws a large-scale map of [[the Shire]] that would many years later be the basis for ''[[A Part of the Shire]]''.<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. lvi</ref>
{{references|n}}
